content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between chests

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup with:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) extracting both iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting the ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving ore to furnace

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for ore collection
- Transport belt system for ore movement

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting array consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input wooden chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output wooden chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between chests and furnaces

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network at positions (10.5,12.5), (7.5,13.5), (7.5,20.5), (11.5,20.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to insert items without having them in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items
- Ensure required items are harvested/crafted before insertion operations

### Errors when trying to extract from invalid positions
- Verify the position exists and contains extractable resources
- Move within range of the target position before attempting extraction

### Errors with full storage containers
- Monitor chest capacities and empty them when needed
- Specific example: Empty the chest at (-5.5,-55.5) to continue mining operations

### System Status Issues
- Multiple entities showing "out of fuel" warnings - ensure proper fuel distribution
- Some inserters waiting for source items - check input material flow
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" - verify proper pipe connections and fluid flow
